content: knitted jumper with round yoke in drops safran the piece is worked top down with lace pattern leaf pattern and ¾-length sleeves sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no e-300 yarn group a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-300-350-400-400-450 g colour 56 powder pink **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches and 30 row in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
